attributes.action: ensure the bonus pot and pay rises at the FSA are in line with the conditions imposed upon majority state owned banks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UKFI acting as representatives of the government have imposed restrictions on the majority state owned banks.  The government must look further than this, and impose the same restrictions on the regulator whose responsibility it was to safeguard the financial services industry, and the public
